@ChrissyCostanza truthfully I am not sure if I liked it or not. Fine to binge watch though, and it suits the January blues well.
THIS is why I can not comprehend doing any more college courses after this one. Just not able for it mentally. College work makes me sad.
I have serious issues mentally when it comes to getting back into the 'groove of things' like this. I always do this.
It's the same module that was the first assignment of the college year, I drove myself nuts doing it at the last minute...
First college assignment of the new year is due in less than 24 hours, I haven't started it and don't really have a clue...
@ATTILAga Queen and Moshpit! Guilty Pleasure songs too please :P.

If @imccinemas decreases the size of the room for @SavoyDublin's screen one I will probably NEVER attend a movie in the cinema again.

I am half debating making my New Years Resolution sober 2017 but I'd like to be able to drink a bit when I move back to Shannon for a while.

Reviewing @TheOfficialA7X & @Disturbed tomorrow. So that is a thing, that, just happened in my life! What a way to kick off 2017!
@issues Bring this tour to the UK/Europe guys! Or just do some headliners again! Don't even care that ye will never play Ireland, will fly!
@beyblade_burst yo when is the UK/EU release?
@AtTiLaSean sad to see ya go man! Was gonna try and catch ye in Glasgow in April! But good luck in the future and with your marriage!
@ATTILAga Moshpit & Queen for sure. Maybe All Hail Rock And Roll too. #NotJustTheSinglesPleaseAndThankYou
@SlamDunkMusic so when is the next announcement? :)
@Stfucuunt like good albums released but very forgettable ones.
@Stfucuunt I found this years releases to be so meeeh that I can't even attempt to do mine haha. 2015 was almost as bad. haha

wtf that came out of nowhere. https://t.co/lVUTGI1lFA

@tlums you won't have that issue next time cause you'll be playing the fucking main room. Show was dope, crowd was dope. Come back soon.

Remember when @issues was meant to be playing Ireland? Was so stoked, especially after I had to cancel my trip to Birmingham to see them...

The sadness being told that @EntertainerToys had no SS Beyblades left on Saturday :(. Staff knew about them so clearly sold out recently!
@MilesExpress999 I've seen it about 15 times and it remains my least favourite too! Does very little for me! Pretty etc. but still!
Seriously @riserecords keep bringing shit like The Rise Up Tour to Europe. @issues and @Cane_Hill next time ya?
@BourgeoisXander 6 months sober here! Told myself I could drink this weekend if I wanted to but decided that I didn't need it! Keep it up!
Off to Glasgow for @TheYashin's last show, holy fuck. Gonna be in a serious rush to make it on time!
Like how does one even review @BiffyClyro without writing 1000 words on them? haha. 27 song sets are NOT easy to cut down the word count on.
Talking about the last 1/3rd of Biffys set has taken me 460 words... So this is looking at 1250-1300 words when I have rewritten the rest.
My laptop broke while I was in the middle of typing my Biffy Clyro review and I hadn't backed it up... :'(.
@TheLifeOfRyanC @TDWPband how long did they play for man? Want to know if it'll be a longer set on Saturday in Glasgow or not. haha
Way too stoked for these shows now! @ENTERSHIKARI @CrossfaithJapan https://t.co/pcbE4YXy0V
That sweet @FIROfficial, @issues, @MIWband & @dangerkids tour package NEEDS to come to Europe. It could fucking sell out smaller arenas!
@riserecords 100% WANT! Got @CalebShomo to sign my copy of This Means War when I saw Beartooth live back in 2015!
Off to Glasgow for @TheYashin's last show on Friday! 1st time seeing them in over 3 years! Happy this is in the set! https://t.co/F8PotVkWS6
@lissabreen ah 40 minutes was better than 30 anyways! That set was intense as fuck towards the end!
@lissabreen Hoping it's a mistake and their set is longer than 30 minutes. >_<.
@lissabreen I don't even get why the band wouldn't argue for a longer set, Jesse is normally a diva like! Very weird.
@lissabreen I just don't get why Brand New are not starting closer to doors? I know support is normally a tad rushed in 3arena but still.
Seeing @BiffyClyro & @brandnewrock in the @3arenadublin tonight! My review of the show will be up asap!
@HelloConnor new band formation going well so? Gonna be heavish or?
. @SlamDunkMusic this year is looking good so far! https://t.co/3BHYLjCFX5
@ConnorM_Photo I don't mind her and big ups to her for where she has gotten and how she has done so. But it just makes no sense. haha.
@ConnorM_Photo like I feel bad for the people going, Tennent's was the same price with class bands also playing it... and it didn't sell out
@ConnorM_Photo legit makes no sense. People in Belfast were confused as it was by Labrinth being on that bill... Lady Leshurr makes no sense
@BushiroadGlobal Otherwise, I see nothing but solid improvements, most of which took far too long to happen.
@BushiroadGlobal to avoid shit like x-1s not top-8ing, a problem Cardfight has constantly had. Making it an auto 10 rounds swiss is weird.
@BushiroadGlobal I still think that you guys are having issues understanding swiss... you play rounds based on attendance numbers...
@HelloConnor After the November 2012 gig we tried to get ye out and ye were having none of it! One of the messiest gigs of my life. haha
@HelloConnor is that November or May? You seemed fairly sober at the November gig so probably May :P.
@HelloConnor I had no ID & couldn't get into the after party so you passed me a beer over the smoking area barrier after we went McDonalds!
@HelloConnor I would like to point out that I owe you a drink from Slam Dunk Ireland back in 2013. haha. Gonna be a good night dude!
So happy that @LiffeyHead now exists, an actual reason to go @atLiffeyValley! The GF picked up @bmthofficial - Count Your Blessings for 15e!
The new @Fangclubband EP is delish.
Two weeks until @TheYashin, @WOLB & @dividesofficial in Glasgow! Then @TDWPband, @MemphisMayFire, @silverstein & @LMTF the next day!
